Verses: 2 en Nenjame, Nee Karththarai Nokki: Dhevareer, En Aandavaraayirukkireer, En Selvam Umakku Vendiyadhaayiraamal,
3 boomiyilulla Parisuththavaangalukkum, Naan En Muzhup Piriyaththaiyum Vaiththirukkira Magaaththumaakkalukkum, Adhu Vendiyadhaayirukkiradhu Endru Sonnaai.
4 anniyadhevanai Naadip Pinpatrugiravargalukku Vedhanaigal Perugum; Avargal Seluththugira Raththa Paanabaligalai Naan Seluththamaatten, Avargal Naamangalai En Udhadugalinaal Uchcharikkavumaatten.
5 karththar En Sudhandharamum En Paaththiraththin Pangumaanavar; En Sudhandharaththai Dhevareer Kaappaatrugireer.
6 nerththiyaana Idangalil Enakkup Pangu Kidaiththadhu; Aam, Sirappaana Sudhandharam Enakku Undu.
7 enakku Aalosanai Thandha Karththaraith Thudhippen; Raakkaalangalilum En Ullindhiriyangal Ennai Unarththum.
8 karththarai Eppozhudhum Enakku Munbaaga Vaiththirukkiren; Avar En Valadhupaarisaththil Irukkirapadiyaal Naan Asaikkappaduvadhillai.
9 aagaiyaal En Irudhayam Pooriththadhu, En Magimai Kalikoorndhadhu; En Maamsamum Nambikkaiyode Thangiyirukkum.
10 en Aaththumaavaip Paadhaalaththil Videer; Ummudaiya Parisuththavaanai Azhivaik Kaanavotteer.
11  Jeevamaarkkaththai Enakkuth Theriyappaduththuveer; Ummudaiya Samugaththil Paripoorana Aanandhamum, Ummudaiya Valadhu Paarisaththil Niththiya Perinbamum Undu.
